source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: Effective Meetings: Boost Meeting Productivity & Creativity

visible_instructors.title: Tatiana Ambrose
visible_instructors.name: Tatiana
visible_instructors.job_title: Grow your creative thinking, writing & dog business skills

items.headline: Boost meeting productivity and lead effective meetings with co-workers or employees. Plus, many creativity exercises.
objectives_summary: Lead productive and valuable meetings, and get more done
Build a stronger team that collaborates well
Properly use incentives to boost creativity in meetings

items.title: Introduction to Organization Change - Getting Started

visible_instructors.title: Dr. Ross Wirth
visible_instructors.name: Dr. Ross
visible_instructors.job_title: Helping Managers learn what they need to know about Change

items.headline: Getting started on the path to organization improvement
objectives_summary: Understand how change models comprise the change leader’s tool kit, making many options available, each for a different purpose
Discover the Essentials of Organizational Change (the 3 things you Have To Do Right)
Classify different change models by purpose

items.title: Reporting Financial Results When Earnings Are Disappointing
items.headline: Steps and Strategies When Earnings Fall Short of Expectations - Financial Reporting Damage Control For Management 2021
objectives_summary: Learn From A Top Rated Instructor Who Has Been Teaching On Udemy Since 2013 and Taught Over 100,000 Students!
News Delivery
Learning From Mistakes

items.title: Emotional Intelligence: The Human Side of Leadership
items.headline: Leading people from the heart with understanding, empathy and emotional intelligence.
objectives_summary: Describe how to use emotional information in effective and meaningful ways
Recognise ways to use the intelligence in empathy at a deep level
Examine reality with an open mind to determine how values, beliefs and mindset create filters that influence experience

items.title: Splunk Overview for Busy People
items.headline: Get an Overview of the Most Powerful Data Platform in one Lunch Break!
objectives_summary: Splunk from a high level
How Splunk Works
How Splunk can help you derive business value from your data

items.title: Six Sigma Statistics with Minitab 19: White and Yellow Belt

visible_instructors.title: Gunjan Subedi
visible_instructors.name: Gunjan
visible_instructors.job_title: Lean Six Sigma and Quality Assurance Specialist

items.headline: Easiest course to learn Minitab and Statistics Six Sigma White Belt Six Sigma Yellow Belt Six Sigma Green & Black Belt
objectives_summary: Students will be able to use Minitab on basic level of statistical analysis
Students will be able to understand the statistical concepts of Six Sigma White Belt (basic) to Six Sigma Yellow Belt (intermediate Level)
Even the hard concepts will be fun to learn with this course

items.title: Set Up a Simple Quality Improvement System

visible_instructors.title: Michele Boyer, RRT
visible_instructors.name: Michele
visible_instructors.job_title: Grant Professional ~ Writing, planning, managing since 1989

items.headline: Troubleshoot and Make Big Improvements, Simply, When You Need Solutions, NOW!
objectives_summary: Set up a complete quality management system
Implement this system immediately
Get all employees actively participating in this system

items.title: Data-Driven Nonprofits
items.headline: Increase your organization's impact thought effective use of data
objectives_summary: How to run a nonprofit organization using data driven decision making, and provide data-driven reporting on outcomes to donor and foundations.

items.title: IT Management Fundamentals - From IT Tech to IT Manager
items.headline: The knowledge and expertise you need to know to become an IT manager and develop those skills
objectives_summary: Moving from a Tech to a Manager          ,
IT Manager Responsibilities
IT Strategies, Roadmaps, Budgets

items.title: Taking the Stress out of Leadership!
items.headline: Helping Executives, Leaders and Managers thrive
objectives_summary: What Stress is. Why Executives and Leaders are wired differently. Symptoms of Stress and how to manage them. The Chemistry of Performance and how to thrive. Stress management solutions

items.title: Create Effective Business Proposal from A-Z
items.headline: Learn to create winning business proposal for your ideas and become a great achiever in life
objectives_summary: Able to create effective business proposal and how to present it to management
Able to start new business with systematic thinking and execution
Able to advance career in the corporate environment

items.title: Learn Cost Accounting
items.headline: A Course on Knowing your Costs/Job Costing/Activity Based Costing/Standard Costing/Variance Analysis
objectives_summary: Understand the three cost categorieds of a manufacturer.
Know the difference between product cost and period costs.
Understand Traditional Costing Systems - Job Costing system & Process Costing

items.title: Lean Tools and Techniques for Flow and Pull
items.headline: Applying Lean in Service and Manufacturing Organizations
objectives_summary: Identify the goals of the visual workplace
Match tools used in the visual workplace with corresponding examples
Evaluate a customer-supplier relationship to determine how well the Just-in-time method is being applied

items.title: Project Management Skills for Non Project Managers
items.headline: Project Management Skills for Non Project Managers
objectives_summary: Understand the best practices of project management
Manage the constraints of time, money, and schedules
Conduct effective meetings

items.title: What the Heck Should I be Doing on LinkedIn?
items.headline: Practical ways for business owners and entrepreneurs to use LinkedIn for branding, marketing and to grow their business
objectives_summary: Gain an understanding of why LinkedIn is important and how it can be used in relationship-based marketing
How to create a top-notch profile that truly represents who you are and is more likely to be found
How to build your credibility and demonstrate your expertise as a business person

items.title: Become Agile with Scrum by Examples (... and get certified)
items.headline: Updated on 2020 - Learning the most used framework to become agile and exploring why it really works
objectives_summary: All you need to know to start with Scrum
Foundations of the world of Agile
How to engage in Continuous Improvement
